title: Slow cooked five spice lamb
ingredients: ['4 lamb shanks', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 tablespoons ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons paprika', '2 tablespoons chilli flakes', '2 tablespoons oregano', '1 sweet potato, cut into cubes', '1 handful raisins (optional)', '1 large white onion, sliced', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 tablespoon rosemary', '1 handful dried apricots, sliced', '2 tomatoes, sliced', '2 lamb OXOÂ® cubes', '600ml (1pt) boiling water']
